name: ComplaintCommunity

We have built the site to try to cover all the complaint â€œbasesâ€ - the website is unique in *allowing you as an individual to post and manage your complaints online, *allowing you to join with a GroupComplaintâ„¢ - our unique tool. No other website offers the facility for a large group of people to manage their common complaint in a uniform manner to get the outcome you want (it’s a bit like a “class action” without all the legal bits!) *connecting you to the complainee directly, other complainers and dedicated Expert Advisers *andâ€¦ if all else fails, they can help you find a Better Offer! *And itâ€™s completely Free To Use for the Consumer!.

We offer traditional services to individuals with complaints. ComplaintCommunityâ„¢ isn’t just for customers to use for their complaints though

*it’s also got a whole suite of custom-built tools to support all business’s to successfully manage their customers complaints! *These have been developed to leading regulatory standards, such as FSA TCF guidelines *Research shows our solution can be up to 400 times cheaper than clients existing complaint management processes.

We estimate that there are more than 500 million complaints made in the UK alone per year.
